title: something wrong with servers?
body: Pretty sure theres something going on with the servers. 3 out of my 5 ranked games today, the enemy has had at least 1 afk....2 of them the enemy had 2 afk's...which isnt so bad cuz normally my team is the one with an afk or 2 lol.  I have also been having "attempting to reconnect" & "disconnected from pvp" messages for the past 2 days. So i know its not just me experiencing problems. I havent seen one thing on the boards about it, and nothing from riot either
